resources.string: Continue
To Unpathed Waters
Collect firefly bait for Perronelle le Noir.
Search nearby Bulrushes to collect {itemName}
The fish aren’t biting much today. Ah, perhaps I've caught too many here... Merde. Have I, ahh, disappointed your plans?
"Actually, I can't fish."
You can't… fish!? That is horrible to hear! It is such a pleasure. Life is difficult, no? Even the smallest things… out of reach. But when you fish, you can reflect.
"Is fishing easy to do?"
As simple as… finding happiness! Well. At times, yes. Easy as digging for worms, at least, and one can lead to the other…
Pardon me. I can… ramble. Reflection is good, yes? But it can lead to brooding. My leg, she makes it difficult to... focus now and again. Ah! I'm out of bait!
“Can I help with that?”
You? No, no, no, no, no. I cannot ask you this. Look at you! That… heroic garb of yours, clearly an important person. Scrounging for bait… this is… peasant's work.
"I'm happy to do it."
Well, if you insist, of course. I could do this myself, you know, but... Your eagerness! I'd be unchivalrous to decline. Oh, and you can find bait in the bushes nearby.
Listen! Can you hear them? The fish, they call out, 'Catch me!' Ha ha!
You see! Very simple, very simple to do. Also… I need no charity; so… ah, for you. Your first fishing pole! She is… old and weathered, yes. But… very capable still!
And Undreamed Shores
Cast, hook, and reel in three fish for Perronelle.
Equip your Fishing Pole
Cast your Fishing Pole
Hook fish
Reel in fish
And for your first lesson: casting without bait is a waste of your time… and the fish's. Think of the bait like a paintbrush. Catching the fish, now that's the art!
"A creative way to look at it."
Ha ha! Yes, you get it, don't you!? The vision. Start with a humble pond, and you'll soon graduate to the great, wide ocean! There you may find the masterpiece.
Ah… I speak of my dream, my eternal longing, my nemesis. The greatest, most terrible fish to ever swim in water. Gladys!
"The fish has a name?"
Yes. Gladys. A wily foe and the end of many a fish-dreamer. I was not always so… sedentary, you know? I have Gladys to thank for that.
She took from me that which was dearest in all the world. And yet, I will best that scaly brute, and have my vengeance.
"Can I help with that too?"
Ah… let's not get ahead of ourselves, my dreamy young apprentice. We all must start somewhere, so get to it. Catch us a fish.
Ah, Aeternum. Is it not the land of fish? I see it… so clearly, everywhere I go.
Fantastic, fantastic. You have been busy with your reel. A master fisher in the making indeed. A burgeoning artist, I might even say.
"I appreciate the compliment."
Listen to you! You are as sunlight that… glimmers upon the deepest waters. La Lueur! Ah, I think my ancient fishing ensemble would interest you.
"Fishing ensemble?"
Yes, the Seekers of the Questing Bass. A sacred order of knights. Who fish. We are noble, regal… not quite profitable. My squires are working on that…
The Good Squire
See Perronelle's assistant, Khadijah Bahri, to continue the fishing quests
Go to Khadijah
They are younger, minds more flexible for… business. One is so diligent! The other is… a bit of an idler. And I… am stuck in my ways. Ah, what a group we are.
"Can I join this order?"
La Lueur, indeed! Even after I say these silly things… still you are eager to continue onwards. There is knightly spirit in you. Oh yes, I can see your glimmer now.
Yes! Go and see my squire, Khadijah. If she approves of your skills then I, Perronnelle le Noir, as Fisher Regent, will accept you into our order.
Like all true fishers of life, Khadijah is a student of the waters. Much yet to learn, but a keen eye for technique!

<g id="male_smallSingleWave" />Oh hello! Rather unusual for someone to find me over here. <g id="female_explainS" />Not that it's much of a secret fishing hole, mind you, it's simply more dangerous around these parts.
This Melancholy Bait
Catch something other than fish, namely one Snail in Fresh Water and one Clam in Salt Water. Next, salvage them for resources.
Catch a Snail in Fresh Water
Salvage an {itemName}
Catch a Clam in Salt Water
Salvage a {itemName}

<g id="male_quidproquo" />Now, was yours that new request we got from Oxboro? <g id="female_apologetic" />I apologize it's been slower than expected. Those rare catches have been… <g id="female_shrugShort" />well. Rare!
“I came from Perronelle.”

Captain Perronelle? <g id="female_covermouthShocked" />Ohh… <g id="male_hanghead" />I thought this might happen. Just… not so soon. <g id="female_crying" />She carried such a weight, she hid it well, but… what can we do?
"She said I might join the order?"
<g id="female_startledHandmouth" />Join? You mean, join the Seekers? Us? Oh!<g id="female_sighRelief" /> That's grand, then! And a relief. <g id="female_explainS" />We could surely use the help.

<g id="male_explain" />She and I have talked about the types of fishers we are looking for. If she's taken with you, that's the first step. <g id="female_gestureForward01" />And hardest. How did you ever manage that?
"Just fishing, and talking."

<g id="female_headnodding" />Huh! I guess that makes sense. <g id="female_thinking" />Captain's ways have always been a little... queer. <g id="male_laugh" />Suppose that's why I like her! Splendid, then! For your first test…
"'First'? How many are there?"

Patience… <g id="female_steadythere" />is critical for fishing. One test at a time. <g id="female_explainS" />This one also benefits the business. You need to catch snails and clams. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />Special bait for special fish!
<g id="male_explain" />My test has multiple steps: following guidance, utilizing skills, working with others. And my personal suggestion: <g id="female_whattheheck" />have fun with it!

<g id="female_nodConsider" />Caught us some snails and clams, have you? Mmm. <g id="female_headnodding" />Pretty ones, too. Grand work, all around. <g id="male_salute2FingersFast" />Feels great being out on the water, yeah?
"It's a nice change of pace."

<g id="female_headnodding" />Ahh, yes. I've always loved the shore life. So romantic, much as Perronelle's story is!<g id="male_pointsoutthere" /> You can read it in that bottle over there.<g id="female_outfitproud" priority="high" /> I even wrote it myself!
The Idle Squire
See Perronelle's other assistant, Urashima Ishii, to continue the fishing quests
Go to Urashima
<g id="male_scoldFingerwag" />But we mustn't get distracted... your test! <g id="female_crossarms" />I need to be assured you can work well with others and prod things when things need prodding.
"Is that a new fishing technique?"

<g id="female_shrugShort" />Something like that. Go find Urashima. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />He's the "other" squire. A hotshot by his own estimation, <g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" priority="high" />but a bit of a laze, in my opinion. You'll learn something, though!
<g id="female_gestureForward01" />Check in with Urashima and we'll be closer to knowing if you have what it takes to be a <g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Seeker of the Questing Bass!

<g id="male_shrugBrief" />In life, you're either the fish or the worm. <g id="male_listenforward" priority="high" />Or the person eating the fish. Or the… um. Wait, what was I talking about… <g id="male_lookaroundStartled01" />Wait! Who are YOU?
Thou Deboshed Fish!
Increase your catch rate by fishing from a Hotspot three times.
Catch anything from (Active) Hotspots

<g id="male_listenforward" priority="high" />In life, you're either the fish or the worm.<g id="male_shrugBrief" /> Or the person eating the fish. Or the person ordering from the person fishing the fish that other person will eat.

<g id="male_shakehead" />Don't tell me Khadijah sent you. <g id="male_noway" priority="high" />I can't keep up with these orders without a break. Or multiple breaks. It's like the fish… want to be caught! There's no end to it.
"Teach me and I'll share the load."

<g id="male_listenforward" priority="high" />If I had another pair of hands, and another fishing pole, I might finish my quota. And then I could finally sleep!<g id="male_spreadarms001" /> How many days has it been. Wait! <g id="female_gestureForward01" />Who ARE you?
"Questing Bass candidate."

<g id="male_shrugBrief" />So she hasn't given up, then. <g id="male_shakehead" />Can't tell if I'm elated or disappointed. But that's good.<g id="female_crossarms" priority="high" /> That's actually truly good news after all those recent episodes she had.
<g id="female_gestureForward01" />Friend. Hear me. <g id="male_explain" />Just because you'll be on Aeternum forever doesn't mean you have to spend all your time fishing.
"But I really do like fishing."

<g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" priority="high" />That's how it starts. You offered to help though. Hotspots are wherever rare fish are jumping out of the water. <g id="male_spreadhands" />If you have special bait from Khadijah, let's use it!
<g id="male_explain" />As our fearless leader would say: Carpe Diem. That's French for 'catch fish all day', right? <g id="male_shakehead" />Or is that French for 'hotspots'? I can't remember.
"What exactly are hotspots?"
<g id="female_headnodding" />Hotspots! Hmm, so you want to learn what I've learned, huh?

<g id="male_explain" />Urashima knows more than I do, but fishing hotspots <g id="female_gestureUpward" />are places where fish fly up from the water! When the spot is active, the fish are rarer and bite quicker.

<g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />Trust me, you will know when you hit a hotspot with your line. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />It can be very exciting! But you must remember: <g id="male_listenforward" priority="high" />hotspots deplete after many fish are caught there!

<g id="male_explain" />When the fish no longer fly up from that spot, it’s been depleted. <g id="female_steadythere" />Patience is a virtue of Questing Bass! Don't worry, that spot will become active again after a time.

<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Never give up, yeah? As your technique improves, you will naturally find more and better hotspots.<g id="male_pointsoutthere" /> Keep an eye out, you never know where or when you might spot one!
<g id="male_beckonBored" />Ah! So you want to learn about hotspots?
"What exactly are hotspots?"

<g id="male_spreadarms001" />Fishing hotspots are places where fish jump for joy! <g id="male_listenforward" />At least, that's how I read their mood. When the spot is active, your bites will be quicker and your fish rarer.

<g id="male_explain" />Land your line truly, and you'll know you are in the hotspot! <g id="male_beckonBored" />Most amateurs forget this next part, so listen up:<g id="male_spreadarms001" /> hotspots deplete after many fish are caught there!

<g id="male_dontknowS" />Did the fish stop jumping? <g id="male_shakehead" />Sorry to tell you, they are not depressed, but that hotspot is depleted. <g id="female_cheerFistpump" /> Cheer up, though! It will become active again after a time.

<g id="female_gestureForward01" />Keep at it. Once your skills at fishing improve, you will naturally find more and better hotspots. <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />The Order of the Questing Bass believes in you!

<g id="female_headnodding" />Not a bad haul, I admit. Only a fraction of what I needed.<g id="male_laugh" /> Haaa… I pace myself for sanity's sake. Unlike Perronelle, <g id="male_shakehead" />who won't take a break to save her life.
"She does seem dedicated."

<g id="female_disagreeRighthandout" />That's because she believes those stories about this magic, giant bass or whatever.<g id="male_shakehead" /> I think all that sitting in the rain and sun has gone to her head.

<g id="male_spreadarms001" />That said, there's something strangely compelling about the tale. <g id="female_shrugShort" />I wrote down some thoughts on it once, waiting for fish to bite, of course. <g id="female_gestureUpward" />You can read it, if you want.
Gilded Tombs do Worms Enfold
Help Urashima with his work by catching fifteen fish anywhere.
Catch fish anywhere

<g id="female_thinking" /> I'm thinking if I can sleep with one eye open, maybe I can fish at the same time as resting. <g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Then I can finish the order on time! <g id="male_dontknowS" />Ah, but what if I dream of fish?
"I can finish the job for you."
<g id="male_laugh" />Ambitious, aren't you? <g id="female_nodConsider" />But you do have a knack for this… yes, help me get this done and I will sing your praises to Perronelle.

Not trying to dump my work… <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />but I'm a Seeker, and well,<g id="female_gestureForward01" /> you're a petitioner. Let's say fifteen fish. That will prove you have the needed commitment.

<g id="female_nodConsider" />I once saw a fish eat another fish. And then I'm thinking, what if there's always a bigger fish? <g id="female_lookConcern" />Where is the biggest fish right now? <g id="female_turnleftStartleSimple" />Are we inside it?

<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Aha! So glad you came back… <g id="female_nodConsider" />and look at those fish! But that's not as important now. <g id="female_lookConcern" />Something… happened with Perronelle. <g id="male_shakehead" />She's gone mad.
"What happened?"

<g id="female_lookConcern" />She's stopped talking and eating.<g id="male_dontknowS" /> She'll do nothing but fish. I think you inspired her, and while that's a great thing,<g id="male_shakehead" /> it also aggravated her condition.
The Woe of Squires
See Khadijah Bahri to get an update on Perronelle.
Go to Khadijah

<g id="female_throwarmsFrustrated" />Stubborn old fisher! Why won't she rest? <g id="female_disagreeRighthandout" />The fish aren't going anywhere! It's like she wants to suffer,<g id="male_crossarmsJudge" /> and I have no idea why.
"I'll go see her."

<g id="female_headnodding" />Yes, please do. Without Perronelle, I'd… well, I don't know what, <g id="male_noway" priority="high" />but that's the problem! This could make her fall Lost. <g id="male_pointsoutthere" />You go and convince her to rest.
<g id="male_dontknowS" />I wonder if she's doing this to herself because I'm not working fast enough… <g id="male_lookawayGuilty" />or my quality isn't high enough…
<g id="female_lookConcern" />Nice to see a friendly face, even if I have sad news. <g id="male_dontknowS" />The order of The Seekers of the Questing Bass might be dissolved, once and for all.
Rots From the Head Down
Catch eight fish greater than 20 inches in length, for love of the craft. It's what Perronelle would want.
Catch fish with a length greater than 20 inches

<g id="female_lookConcern" />Perronelle's completely lost it. Catches fish after fish, beautiful fish, and then throws them back. <g id="male_noway" priority="high" />She won't eat… or barely even talk to me.
"Let me try."

<g id="female_headnodding" />Be my guest, but words won’t work. <g id="female_explainS" />Her wound. It never heals, you know? Gets worse and worse. <g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" priority="high" />She tries to hide how bad it is, but I can tell.

<g id="female_headshakeSmall" />People can only tolerate so much pain, and after this many centuries she is finally reaching her limit. <g id="female_lookdownSorry" />I fear she's on the verge of becoming Lost.
"There's nothing we can do?"

<g id="male_dontknowS" />I don't know. The only thing I can think of is to fish.<g id="female_clasphandsConvince" /> You, me, Urashima… if we fish as madly as she does,<g id="female_headnodding" /> then maybe she'll take notice.

<g id="female_nodding" />So yes, you're right. We can do something, <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />and it's something we all know and love. <g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Let's do it! Go for the big fish, as many as you can reel in!
<g id="male_explain" />Remember, only the biggest of fish will be enough to convince her! <g id="female_handsforwardRequest" />Do it for the Captain.

<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />You did it! I've been trying to catch some myself, <g id="female_headshakeSmall" />but they were all so small and pathetic looking.<g id="male_lookawayGuilty" /> I hate to say, but I was losing heart.
"Are these large enough?"
<g id="female_nodding" />Oh, my! Yes. They are quite gorgeous. <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />Perronelle would be so proud to see how far you've come.
The Regent's Wounds
Check on Perronelle le Noir.
Go to Perronelle

<g id="male_explain" />With these fish, our plan has the best chance of success. <g id="female_headshakeSmall" />I can't know how she'll respond, in her state, <g id="male_outfitproud" />but I can hope.
"I'm not giving up.
<g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" priority="high" />Nor I. When I came to Aeternum, everyone seemed self-interested, and uncaring. <g id="male_explain" />But the Captain always treated me right.
"Where is she?"

<g id="male_pointsoutthere" />Out by the sea. Her favorite fishing spot. <g id="male_convince01" />Do hurry. She was barely sitting upright last time I went out there. <g id="female_gestureForward01" />Show her your catch… and say a prayer.
<g id="female_beckonUrgent" priority="high" />Hurry on. Captain always likes to see the sheen of water on the scales when judging a catch. <g id="male_laugh" />Says she likes the shine of it.
Agony… The agony! Damn you, Gladys… you thief! You stole my self from me… you stole… everything!
Depths Close Round About
Solve the mystery of Gladys by collecting one Squid Ink and one Catfish Whisker after salvaging Hooked Squid and Barbed Catfish.
Read Perronelle's notes to learn what she discovered
Catch a Hooked Squid
Catch a Barbed Catfish
Salvage a Hooked Squid for {itemName}
Salvage a Barbed Catfish for {itemName}
Go to the location mentioned in Perronelle’s journal and catch the monster-fish Gladys
I have tried so hard. So hard! Ah, and it takes so much effort to do things that are so miniscule. And yet I reach for the ocean. Like you did that day, La Lueur.
"Perronelle…?"
In my mind, in my pain… sinking into both depths. Down and down! Khadijah… too kind, I could not bring her. Urashima… too weary, I could not bring him. I am alone.
"You aren't alone. I'm here."
I see that. Your glimmer in the deepness. I fished. And fished. And fished! And suddenly understood her secret. Gladys! I will make her return what she stole!
My brother. I cannot speak his name… it hurts more than this damned leg. But I know. I learned her secret! Read my notes! Please… finish what I cannot…!
Ah… ahh… Where are you? I know you survive still. I know it! If only I could… cast… with all my might…!

<g id="female_lookaroundWonder" /> I cannot believe this sight. And the air! <g id="male_lookUp" />Paaahh, how fresh it is! <g id="female_gestureForward01" />But who are you? <g id="female_turnleftStartleSimple" />What was that? <g id="male_spreadarms001" />What has happened?
"You were inside a fish."

<g id="male_leanbackCovermouth" />The whole time? It was Gladys, wasn't it?<g id="female_headshakeSmall" /> Well, thank you for fishing me out.<g id="male_saluteFistToChest" /> Allow me to introduce myself. I am Pelles, the Fisher King. I serve King Artorius.
"Is Perronelle your sister?"

<g id="female_nodding" />Yes, you know her? When Gladys attacked, she bit off Peronelle's leg. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />I assumed it would steal the soul from her, but you are saying she…<g id="male_listenforward" priority="high" /> she made it?
"Yes, but she's not well."

<g id="female_headshakeSmall" />Of course not. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />Wounds caused by that fish will never heal. Believe me, I have seen it before. <g id="female_beckonUrgent" priority="high" />There is a way, but we must move quickly.
The Fisher King Returned
Fish for the spawn of Gladys so that Pelles can scrape off their essence and save Perronelle.
Catch fish with weight greater than 30 pounds
Talk to Pelles
Go to Perronelle
Go help Perronelle
<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Now is the time to cast with all your might, my dear savior! <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />For Perronelle! In the name of Artorius and his Honor and Glory!
"What are we fishing for?"

<g id="male_convince01" />The offspring of Gladys. Devil monsters, as she. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />Monstrous fish with the potential to become gargantuan. <g id="female_explainS" />But within their gullets, the cure we need.

<g id="female_beckonUrgent" priority="high" />So go quickly. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />These will be very, very big fish! Catch enough, and I can extract what I need for the tincture to aid my sister. <g id="female_gestureForward01" />Cast, now!
<g id="female_beckonUrgent" priority="high" />Those devil fish! You must catch them quickly!

<g id="female_nodding" />You return victorious, I am certain of it. <g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" priority="high" />I can smell those bug-eyed monsters and the foul evil that lurks in their hearts. <g id="male_lookDown" />I know that smell all too well.
"Is this enough?"

<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />Marvelous! You caught them all! <g id="male_itemTakeRight" priority="high" />I need but a scraping from their tongues. Keep the rest. <g id="male_spreadarms001" />You have earned them, each and every one.
<g id="female_beckonUrgent" priority="high" />Now, please, can you tell me where I might find Perronelle?
"Her favorite fishing spot."
<g id="male_laugh" />Of course! Ha ha! She will never change. <g id="male_outfitproud" />More stubborn than a catfish. Not once did she give up on finding me, even though it nearly destroyed her.
Did I not tell you? I would make myself whole. And look, Pelles is too. I have you to thank for both. You! Our newest Seeker of the Questing Bass!
"Thank you. It's an honor."
Well, by the sea's bounty, you hooked Gladys, that is a master fisher's feat. Make no mistake, we were victorious today, but she will strike again.
With Pelles's elixir… and his presence, my pain is relieved. I still must sit in my chair, but it does not stop me from fishing, so I cannot complain.
"I'm glad you're restored."
Before you came, I was about to give this all up. But it was your glimmer! As you cast, as you helped! And so I could not. Perronelle le Noir salutes you! My Lueur!
What more do you want? Get fishing! What else is there to life, La Lueur?

<g id="female_lookaroundWonder" />It will take much time to reacclimate to these wide open spaces. <g id="female_nodding" />I look forward to it. And for freeing me from my wretched prison, <g id="male_saluteFistToChest" />my profound gratitude forever.

<g id="female_cheerFistpump" />King Pelles is back! Congratulations! <g id="male_spreadarms001" />Although this means I'm now fourth-in-command, it was worth it. <g id="female_chuckle" />I've never seen the Captain so happy!

<g id="female_nodding" />Heard you rescued the Fisher King and saved Perronelle. <g id="male_outfitproud" />Not bad for a day of fishing. And better yet, he can help with our next order. <g id="female_handsonhipsShakehead" />It's… exhaustingly ambitious.
Ahhhhahhhhahhhhhhhh!
Ugh! Uhhh. Eh! Eh. Guhhhh…
Well, sometimes you catch the fish. Sometimes the fish catches you.
